# 'clafouti-begin' recipe
# Simple activity recognition data file

# Spoon
1 SPOON_STIR.csv SPOON_STIR stir
1 SPOON_SCOOP.csv SPOON_SCOOP scoop
1 SPOON_SCOOP1.csv SPOON_SCOOP scoop

# Ladle
1 LADLE_POUR.csv LADLE_POUR scoop/pour
1 LADLE_POUR1.csv LADLE_POUR scoop

# Small knife - scrape out vanilla seeds
1 BIGKNIFE_SCRAPEOFF.csv SMALLKNIFE_SCRAPE scrape-off  # DATA FROM BIG KNIFE FOR NOW
1 SMALLKNIFE_SPREAD.csv SMALLKNIFE_SCRAPE spread
# Small knife - core pears
1 SMALLKNIFE_CORE.csv SMALLKNIFE_CORE core
# Small knife - quarter or slice pears
1 SMALLKNIFE_SLICE.csv SMALLKNIFE_SLICE slice
1 SMALLKNIFE_CHOP.csv SMALLKNIFE_SLICE chop

# Big knife - scrape out vanilla seeds
1 BIGKNIFE_SCRAPEOFF.csv BIGKNIFE_SCRAPE scrape-off
1 BIGKNIFE_SHAVE.csv BIGKNIFE_SCRAPE shave
# Big knife - quarter or slice pears
1 BIGKNIFE_CHOP.csv BIGKNIFE_SLICE chop
1 BIGKNIFE_SLICE.csv BIGKNIFE_SLICE slice

# Peeler
1 PEELER_PEEL.csv PEELER_PEEL peel

# Whisk
1 WHISK_WHISK.csv WHISK_WHISK whisk
1 WHISK_WHISK1.csv WHISK_WHISK whisk
